Segment.name: BCI
Segment.comment: To identify information basic to the processing of any claims transaction

Field.name: IndustryCode
Field.comment: Code indicating a code from a specific industry code list

Field.name: InsuranceTypeCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the type of insurance policy within a specific insurance program

Field.name: ReferenceIdentification
Field.comment: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

Field.name: StateOrProvinceCode
Field.comment: Code (Standard State/Province) as defined by appropriate government agency

Field.name: DateTimePeriodFormatQualifier
Field.comment: Code indicating the date format, time format, or date and time format

Field.name: DateTimePeriod
Field.comment: Expression of a date, a time, or range of dates, times or dates and times

Field.name: ReportTypeCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the title or contents of a document, report or supporting item

Field.name: CurrencyCode
Field.comment: Code (Standard ISO) for country in whose currency the charges are specified

SyntaxNote.name: P0506
SyntaxNote.comment: If either BCI05 or BCI06 is present, then the other is required.
